infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Unum needs camera access to capture photos and videos for sharing.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Unum needs microphone access to record video with audio.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Unum needs your location to show nearby content and tag your uploads.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Unum needs photo library access to save captured media.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Unum to access your camera to capture photos and videos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Unum to access your microphone for video recording.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Unum to use your location to show nearby content.
